availability.tooltip: Using your details, we will try to connect you with a person who is available at the same time as you. These are only approximate (for example, most weeks I am available on Wednesday evenings between 6pm and 8pm).

conditions.checkbox_label: <bold>I will comply with the listed principles above.</bold>
conditions.disclaimer: So far, our participants have had a positive experience - we want it to stay that way. If you have any questions please contact us at any time.
conditions.heading: Please read these principles carefully before you start!
conditions.info_text: When using Little World, there are some important principles to follow to protect both yourself and the people you are interacting with.
conditions.point1: Please be <highlight>polite in your interactions</highlight> with each other.
conditions.point2: This also includes <highlight>punctuality</highlight> and <highlight>reliability</highlight> for appointments.
conditions.point3: For your safety, please <highlight>do not exchange private contact details</highlight> (address, phone number).
conditions.point4: Any form of <highlight>discrimination</highlight> (including racism & ageism) <highlight>or harassment will not be tolerated</highlight>. Please report any violations to us immediately.
conditions.title: For a respectful interaction
confirm_match_description: We think that <highlight>{{name}}</highlight> is a suitable conversation partner for you.
confirm_match_instruction: Only click "Accept" if you're willing to have at least 10, 30-minute conversations. When you hit accept, make sure to send <highlight>{{name}}</highlight> a message.
cp_searching_text: We are currently looking for a new conversation partner for you
donate.description: With Little World, we have created a digital platform where German learners and volunteer native speakers can easily connect, support one another and exchange ideas ‚Äî all for free. Your donation helps keep this possible and enhances our services. This year, thanks to our sponsor, the German TV Lottery, every donation will be quintupled! But we need to hit our target to unlock this support. Every bit counts!
donate.subtitle: Help us connect 25,000 people to improve there German and create a more integrated society.
donate.title: Help us connect 25,000 people to improve there German and create a more integrated society.
error_view.title: Uh oh, this page doesn't exist
error.permissions: In order to join a call, you need to provide us access to at least one of your device's microphone or camera. Please check your permission settings.
error.server_issue: Issue connecting to the server. Please try again.

q1.question: Can I choose the people I want to talk to?
q1.answer: Little World matches you based on common interests. If it doesn't work out, please let us know and we connect you with the next person. You can dissolve your match at any time - and in the user form you can set everything, for example which topics you are interested in or which language level your conversation partner should have.

q2.question: I don't have a match yet. Who can I contact?
q2.answer: First of all sorry! We are working hard to get everyone matched as soon as possible. Sometimes it can take a while. If it's been too long for you, contact our support and we'll take care of it right away!

q3.question: I can't think of anything to talk about. What can I do?
q3.answer: Then there's always the topic of weather. Or penguins. Or pizza. And if you can get through that too, we've prepared questions on the platform to help you with the conversation - try it out now!

q4.question: Technical issues on Little World?
q4.answer: Whoops! If you have any technical problems, please contact our support and we'll take care of it right away!

q5.question: Camera, microphone or loudspeaker not working?
q5.answer: Please remember to grant access to the camera and microphone. Only with these permissions a video call can take place. At the start you will be asked for it, if this does not work, check your settings in the browser. You can find the respective instructions here: ‚Ä¢ Chrome ‚Ä¢ Firefox ‚Ä¢ Safari ‚Ä¢ Edge If it still doesn't work, write to our support and we will be happy to help.

q6.question: Is there anything I can do to prepare for the interviews?
q6.answer: Just think about what interests you. Is it the other culture, everyday life, hobbies - the topics of conversation are as diverse as you and your conversation partner.

q7.question: What if I don't like the match?
q7.answer: This is what can happen. We match you based on common interests, but sometimes it just doesn't fit. Then we will find new friendly conversation partners for you!

q8.question: My match doesn't answer me?
q8.answer: Please contact our support. For privacy reasons, we do not provide further contact information. But maybe we can reach your match in other ways. Otherwise, we will be happy to find new conversation partners for you!

q9.question: First-name basis? Sie or du?
q9.answer: At Little World we are all on a first-name basis and when speaking German we use the informal "du" rather than "Sie". If the person you are talking to would prefer to be addressed using "Sie", it is of course polite to honour that. üòä

q1.question: Is it possible to have group discussions?
q1.answer: We'll be offering that soon! Theme-specific or completely free-style. We're looking forward to that! In addition, our community meetings take place weekly: To get to know each other and exchange ideas. Access and dates can be found in the section 'Home' and then 'Community Calls'.

q2.question: Does it make sense to exchange private information?
q2.answer: At least you don't have to. At Little World, everything is anonymous. How much you reveal about yourself in the conversations is entirely up to you!

q3.question: Can I have several conversation partners?
q3.answer: Volunteers are welcome to help as much as they like. We make it possible for German learners to have two active partners. Because many people are still looking for a match and we would like to provide one for everyone.

q4.question: Technical fault?
q4.answer: Suddenly nothing works anymore? If technical problems arise, please contact our support and we will take care of it immediately!

q5.question: Insult or harassment during a conversation?
q5.answer: We don't like that at all! Please contact our support immediately and we will intervene!

q6.question: What if traumas break out or suicidal thoughts are expressed?
q6.answer: Please do not solve it yourself. In such situations, contact our support and we will find professionals in the field.

q1.question: Can I also meet people in private?
q1.answer: If your counterpart also feels like it, gladly! After all, Little World wants to promote integration and friendship.

q2.question: Are there also Little World Community meetings?
q2.answer: There are! We meet online every week to exchange ideas and get to know each other. Access and dates can be found in the section 'Home' and then 'Community Calls'. You can easily join the conversations on the WebApp. We look forward to hearing from you!

q3.question: Can I give feedback on the platform?
q3.answer: Feedback is always welcome! Feel free to write us a message in the support chat or use our contact form: https://home.little-world.com/kontakt.

q4.question: How can I delete my account?
q4.answer: At the moment it still works manually. Please contact our support and we will take care of it!

q5.question: How can I help Little World?
q5.answer: Join in! We are always looking for support. For programming, promotion, public relations and much more. We can use all the help we can get - donations help too. Just write to us in the chat or at oliver@little-world.com

forgot_password.success_message: Email sent. Open your email to reset your password.

interests.description_placeholder_learne: Nicht nur 'Ich m√∂chte Deutsch lernen' - das ist uns bewusst. Erz√§hle uns etwas Pers√∂nliches √ºber dich.
interests.description_tooltip: Help your conversation partner get a first impression of you. E.g. do you like to go for walks or like to bake? How do you enjoy spending your days? Do you like to travel? Let your creativity run free!
interests.info_text: These details are only visible to you and the Little World team.

language_level_card.title: Boost your German

notifications.title: Notifications
partner1.info_text: These details are only visible to you and the Little World team.
partner1.language_level_tooltip:
The CEFR Levels:
A1: Understands and uses everyday expressions and simple sentences.
A2: Understands frequently used expressions on personal and everyday topics.
B1: Understands main points in clear standard language on familiar topics. 
B2: Understands complex texts and can express themselves spontaneously and fluently on various topics.
C1: Understands demanding texts and can express themselves spontaneously and fluently.
C2: Understands with ease everything read or heard and can reproduce information precisely and fluently.

partner1.preference_note: Please note that selecting a specific preference can result in longer waiting times as we really try to respect your wishes. If you'd prefer a quicker matching time we recommend selecting the general option.
partner1.speech_medium_tooltip: You do not have to provide any contact details for our in-app video calls. However, if you prefer to speak by phone, you would have to exchange your phone number with the other person in the chat.

partner1.tooltip: This relates to speaking ability only. A1 to C2 are common language certificates, although refugees from Ukraine, for example, are still at the beginning and usually have an A1/A2 level.
pcs_sub_heading: Would you like to join this conversation?

report_modal_confirmation: Thank you, {{name}} has been reported and you have been unmatched with them immediately. We take all forms of misconduct extremely seriously as it's of the upmost importance to us that Little World remains a safe space for all. We'll follow up with you as soon as we can.
report_modal_description: We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with <highlight>{{name}}</highlight>. Your report will be treated with complete confidentiality and reviewed with the utmost care. You will be automatically unmatched with {{ name }} and therefore no longer able to contact each other. Your feedback helps us take appropriate actions to make our community even safer. Thank you!

resources.beginners.apps_1: Duolingo: Duolingo ist eine gute App, um spielerisch die Sprache zu lernen oder zu √ºben. Und man kann sie kostenlos nutzen.
resources.beginners.apps_2: Anton: Anton ist eine Sch√ºler-App, wo alle Inhalte kostenlos sind und es keine Werbung gibt. Dort findest du ‚ÄûDeutsch Zweitsprache‚Äú als eines der F√§cher, die man in Stufe 0, 1 und 2 lernen kann.
resources.beginners.apps_intro: Am besten erg√§nzt du die Kurse mit einer App. So macht das √úben Spa√ü und du bleibst dran. Diese Apps sind kostenlos:
resources.beginners.description: Um Deutsch zu lernen, empfehlen wir, an einem Deutschkurs teilzunehmen. Mit diesen digitalen Ressourcen kannst du den Kurs erg√§nzen.
resources.beginners.disclaimer: Sobald du das Niveau B1 erreicht hast, kannst du dein Sprachniveau bei Little World √§ndern. Dann k√∂nnen wir f√ºr dich einen Gespr√§chspartner suchen, mit dem du dich auf Deutsch austauschen kannst.
resources.beginners.intro: Deutsch lernen ist einfach ‚Äì mit diesen kostenlosen Websites und Apps, die wir f√ºr dich ausgesucht haben
resources.beginners.title: Learning resources for beginners
resources.beginners.websites_1: VHS Lernportal: Entdecke komplette Kurse f√ºr alle Sprachniveaus online oder als App, in 20 verschiedenen Sprachen verf√ºgbar.
resources.beginners.websites_2: Learning German: Hier findest du eine umfangreiche Liste an kostenlosen Ressourcen und Online-Kursen.
resources.beginners.websites_intro: Diese Websites bieten Online-Kurse, um Deutsch in deinem eigenen Tempo zu lernen:
resources.description_communication: <bold>St√§rke deine Kommunikationskompetenz:</bold> Unsere Trainings helfen dir, kulturelle Unterschiede zu verstehen und zu sch√§tzen. Die kurzen 10-12-min√ºtigen Impulse regen zur Reflexion und pers√∂nlichen Weiterentwicklung an. Du kannst die Themen einzeln oder nacheinander bearbeiten. Mit jeder Einheit st√§rkst du deine F√§higkeit, in allen Lebensbereichen flexibel, offen und positiv zu kommunizieren.
resources.glossary_communication: In diesem Glossar werden alle schwierigen W√∂rter aus den Videos einfach erkl√§rt.
resources.method_communication: <bold>Lebenslanges Lernen:</bold> Lernen ist ein lebenslanger Weg. Unsere Trainingsmaterialien bleiben dauerhaft verf√ºgbar, sodass du jederzeit darauf zur√ºckgreifen kannst. Zuk√ºnftige Materialien werden hier ebenfalls ver√∂ffentlicht. Wir freuen uns darauf, gemeinsam zu lernen und zu wachsen.
resources.my_story.description: Every encounter is unique, and it is precisely these special stories that touch us and show us how beautiful diversity can be. This is something that should be shared! Let others share in your experience and tell us your story.
resources.my_story.disclaimer: <bold>Important note:</bold> You only agree to the publication of your story and pictures on our website, in our social media channels and newsletter after you have approved the story.
resources.my_story.examples: Curious to see what the stories look like? Take a look at some existing ones!
resources.my_story.intro: How long have you been chattting on Little World? What did you learn about yourselves? How did it feel? Were there any funny or particularly enriching moments? We are curious and would like to share these special experiences!
resources.my_story.outro_1: As soon as you have approved the story, it will be published on our website. We will also share it via our social media channels and in our newsletter to inspire as many people as possible.
resources.my_story.outro_2: You can also share the story yourself to help us encouraging others to join and contribute to a diverse and integrated society.
resources.my_story.step_1: Fill out the interview form together: Fill out the interview form together: Use one of your conversations to talk about your experiences. One of you can write down the answers while you chat. At the end, you can check together whether everything fits. Access the form here.
resources.my_story.step_2: <bold>Send us one picture of each of you:</bold> a portrait of each of you is perfect! It doesn't have to be professional - a good mobile phone photo will do. Just ask someone to take the picture for you (selfies are often not ideal). Make sure that the picture is not too small and that you are alone in it. Don't worry, we'll edit the pictures afterwards! You can upload your images using the file selector at the bottom of the page.
resources.my_story.step_3: <bold>We will create a short story and a nice image</bold> We will create a short story and a nice image from your photos and answers. You will receive both by e-mail for approval before we publish them.
resources.my_story.steps_intro: It's easy - it only takes three simple steps:
resources.my_story.submit_error: Issue uploading images. Please try again
resources.my_story.subtitle: How it works?
resources.my_story.title: Tell us your story!
resources.partners.lern_fair_intro: Lern-Fair e.V. has been offering free, digital learning support for educationally disadvantaged students since 2020. With private learning support for students with learning deficits and less access to education or offering group courses with a different focus, they aim to give students throughout Germany free and unbureaucratic access to digital educational opportunities and thus create educational opportunities. Their major goal is to give all students the same opportunities for education.
resources.partners.lern_fair_presentatio: Or come directly to the <bold>LernFair presentation on Monday, 14 October at 17:00.</bold>
resources.teacher_communication: <bold>√úber die Trainerin:</bold> Raquel Barros, Leiterin der Werkstatt der Kulturen beim Diakonischen Werk im Aachen e.V., bringt viel Erfahrung in interkultureller Kommunikation und Zusammenarbeit mit. Lass dich von ihrer Expertise inspirieren!
resources.title: Resources

We'll answer your questions, give you a few tips, and help safeguard you and the rest of our community.
self_info.gender_tooltip: In order to create a pleasant and safe atmosphere for conversation, we also take cultural and personal wishes into account, e.g. the gender of the other person.
self_info.language_skills_label: What is your language level? Only related to speaking.
self_info.language_skills_tooltip: For better conversations, we try to connect you with a person who potentially speaks the same languages.
self_info.post_code_tooltip: As a non-profit organization, we provide regional supporters with transparent and anonymous information about our regional impact. For example, "54 people in Atlantis". In addition, we will soon also be providing information in person.
self_info.target_group_label: Select the group you most align with:
self_info.target_group_tooltip: e.g. students, pensioners, jobseekers, ... this information helps us to measure our impact and better understand the needs in our society.
self_info.title: About Yourself

sign_up.name_tooltip: Enter your first and last name here
sign_up.privacy_policy: Please take note of our privacy policy
sign_up.title: Create account
support_us.advanced_ways.title: Advanced Ways to Help
support_us.become_a_volunteer.descriptio: Click on "Find a Conversation" to assist someone in improving their German skills. If you're a C1-level German learner, you can volunteer to help someone at a lower level by adjusting your search criteria after clicking on ‚ÄúFind a Conversation‚Äù. Your support can make a significant difference in their learning journey.
support_us.become_a_volunteer.title: Help Another Person as a Volunteer
support_us.corporate_involvement.descrip: Persuade your company to donate to Little World, participate in corporate volunteering, or provide other forms of support. Feel free to share our One-Pager and website. Contact us for additional information and any way we can support you.
support_us.corporate_involvement.title: Corporate Involvement
support_us.description: Our utopia is a society where unexpected friendships happen and where diversity is celebrated. We firmly believe this is achievable. We are leading the way ‚Äì but as a small team with limited resources as a Non-Profit, we need you to walk this path with us and support us to achieve this vision. Here are all the ways to support us:
support_us.distribute.description: Distribute our materials in places like cafes, bars, doctors' offices, or hairdressers. These places are often willing to showcase our materials. Sign up with your address and name and we will send you posters, flyers, and/or postcards for free.
support_us.distribute.title: Distribute Promotional Materials
support_us.donate.description: Support Little World with a financial contribution or donate goods for welcome presents to immigrants. As a non-profit organization, your donations help us continue our work and support immigrants in Germany.
support_us.donate.title: Donate
support_us.get_interviewed.description: Share your story and experiences with Little World by getting interviewed for our blog or podcast. This helps us attract more participants. We will only mention your first name or use a fictional name if you prefer to remain anonymous.
support_us.get_interviewed.title: Get Interviewed
support_us.intermediate_ways.title: Intermediate Ways to Help
support_us.join_events.description: Participate in our group events to connect with our community, learn, and share your experiences.
support_us.join_events.title: Join Group Events
support_us.join_groups.description: Typically only 5-10% of your followers on social media see your post. To enhance our visibility, we have created WhatsApp and Signal groups where we share direct links to our posts for quick engagement. Fast engagement after posting significantly improves our reach. Join our WhatsApp and Signal groups to stay updated and spread some love to help boost our visibility.
support_us.join_groups.title: Join Our Engagement Groups
support_us.organize_an_event.description: Share your passion, knowledge, or the unique aspects of your home country with our community by hosting a group event. Events can range from 5 to 30 minutes and provide a great opportunity to connect, practice German, learn new things, and discover interesting conversation topics.
support_us.organize_an_event.title: Organize Your Own Group Event
support_us.share_improvements.descriptio: We value your input! Share your ideas on how we can make Little World better for everyone. Additionally, help us improve Little World by reporting any bugs or issues you encounter. Please mention the device and browser you are using in order for us to fix it accordingly.
support_us.share_improvements.title: Share Improvement Ideas
support_us.share_with_friends.descriptio: Help us spread the word about Little World via word of mouth, social media, WhatsApp, or email newsletters. Find a variety of text and image templates in our Media Kit.
support_us.share_with_friends.title: Share with Friends
support_us.simple_ways.title: Simple Ways to Help
support_us.social_media.description: Follow, like, and comment on our social media posts. Your engagement helps us reach more people. Don‚Äôt forget to turn on notifications for our posts and to select ‚ÄúSee first‚Äù on Facebook.
support_us.social_media.title: Follow and Engage on Social Media
support_us.subscribe_to_newsletter.descr: Stay updated with the latest news and events from Little World by subscribing to our newsletter. You'll know our progress as a community and learn how you can further contribute.
support_us.subscribe_to_newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
support_us.thank_you.message: Thank you so much for your support ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è
support_us.thank_your_partner.descriptio: Thank your match and express your appreciation for the conversations. Learners especially can thank their volunteers. Showing gratitude and appreciation is the best way to keep everyone motivated, engaged, and make someone's day a bit brighter.
support_us.thank_your_partner.title: Thank Your Conversation Partner
support_us.title: Reaching a better society together
support_us.volunteer.description: Become a valuable member of our enthusiastic and supportive team! We welcome everyone and can use all volunteers, regardless of your background or skill set. We are particularly seeking volunteers with skills in building cooperations ("sales"), programming, social media, or marketing. Your support is crucial in helping us achieve our vision of a utopian society. Join our daily team meetings on Zoom at 12:00 PM (Monday to Friday) or fill out our quick form to get in touch with us and start making a difference.
support_us.volunteer.title: Volunteer in Our Dynamic Team
support_us.write_a_review.description: Share your positive experiences with Little World by writing a five-star review on Google. For improvement suggestions, please use our support chat or the "Help" section form.
support_us.write_a_review.title: Write a Review on Google

user_form_notifications.phone_number_too: Your phone number will only be visible to the Little World team. Your number will never be passed on to third parties and you will not receive any promotional calls.

user_type.info_text: These details are only accessible to you and the Little World team.
user_type.learner_description: I want to practice speaking German.
user_type.title: How would you like to participate?
user_type.volunteer_description: I would like to help others learn German.
validation.birth_year_empty: Please enter your year of birth
validation.email_wrong_format: This is not a valid email.
validation.generic_try_again: There was a server issue. Please try again.
validation.image_upload_required: File upload failed, have you selected a file under 1MB? If you can't upload a file please use an avatar instead.
validation.name_contains_unallowed_chara: The name you have entered contains unpermitted characters, e.g. space.
validation.not_enough_interests: Please select at least one interest
validation.password_constraint_not_met: Password too weak, please use at least one special character and one number. Also, your password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.password_mismatch: The password you entered don't match.
validation.password_too_common: This password is too common, please use a more secure password.
validation.phone_number_empty: Wenn du per sms oder Telefon benachrichtig werden willst gib bitte deine Handy nummer an.
validation.phone_number_not_numeric: Your phone number contains unallowed characters.
validation.phone_number_too_short: Your phone number seems to be too short.
verify_email.description: To confirm your account, please enter the 5-digit code we sent to {{ email }}. If you did not receive an email, please check your spam folder.
verify_email.help_text: You can't find your code? Check your spam folder! Still can't find it? Contact support@little-world.com
verify_email.title: Verify your email
welcome.description: Let's start with a few short questions to find the best possible match for you and take your needs into account.
welcome.note: You can change the information given at any time.
